trans-unit.source: Migrate your solution to SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Migrate your solution to SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Migration guidance for bringing your solution to Azure SQL Data Warehouse platform.
trans-unit.target: Migration guidance for bringing your solution to Azure SQL Data Warehouse platform.

trans-unit.source: Migrate your solution to SQL Data Warehouse
trans-unit.target: Migrate your solution to SQL Data Warehouse

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse is a distributed database system that elastically scales to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse is a distributed database system that elastically scales to meet your needs.

trans-unit.source: To maintain both performance and scale not all features within SQL Server are implemented inside SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: To maintain both performance and scale not all features within SQL Server are implemented inside SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: The following migration topics touch on some of the key factors for migrating your solution to SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: The following migration topics touch on some of the key factors for migrating your solution to SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Designing data warehouses for scale introduces different design patterns and so traditional approaches aren't always the best.
trans-unit.target: Designing data warehouses for scale introduces different design patterns and so traditional approaches aren't always the best.

trans-unit.source: You will probably find that you will want to adapt your solution to ensure you take full advantage of the distributed platform provided by SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: You will probably find that you will want to adapt your solution to ensure you take full advantage of the distributed platform provided by SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: It is also important to remember that SQL Data Warehouse is a platform based in Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: It is also important to remember that SQL Data Warehouse is a platform based in Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Therefore part of your migration may well include transferring your data to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Therefore part of your migration may well include transferring your data to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Data transfer is a subject in its own right and should be carefully considered; especially as volumes increase.
trans-unit.target: Data transfer is a subject in its own right and should be carefully considered; especially as volumes increase.

trans-unit.source: Data transfer should also not be confused with data loading which is again a discrete topic.
trans-unit.target: Data transfer should also not be confused with data loading which is again a discrete topic.

trans-unit.source: Migration guidance
trans-unit.target: Migration guidance

trans-unit.source: Before embarking on your migration make sure you have read through these articles to ensure you understand some of the product differences and fundamental concepts.
trans-unit.target: Before embarking on your migration make sure you have read through these articles to ensure you understand some of the product differences and fundamental concepts.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: For additional development tips, see the <link><linkText>development overview[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional development tips, see the <link><linkText>development overview[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can also view the <link><linkText>Transact-SQL reference[]</linkText><title></title></link> for even more information.
trans-unit.target: You can also view the <link><linkText>Transact-SQL reference[]</linkText><title></title></link> for even more information.

trans-unit.source: Finally, check out the <link><linkText>loading overview[]</linkText><title></title></link> that discusses various data loading options as well as providing step by step guidance.
trans-unit.target: Finally, check out the <link><linkText>loading overview[]</linkText><title></title></link> that discusses various data loading options as well as providing step by step guidance.
